name: Daiquiri
about: The Daiquiri originated in Cuba in the late 1800s and was named after a beach near Santiago. It's a simple but perfectly balanced combination of rum, lime, and sugar.
instructions: Add all ingredients to a shaker with ice
Shake vigorously until well-chilled, about 15 seconds
Double strain into a chilled coupe glass
Garnish with a lime wheel if desired
notes: The Daiquiri is one of the great test drinks for bartenders - its simplicity means there's nowhere to hide poor technique. Use a quality white rum and fresh lime juice for best results.
